thread.title: It took a while, but Plunkett won the big one — twice
thread.title_full: It took a while, but Plunkett won the big one — twice - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Ron Kroichick
title: It took a while, but Plunkett won the big one — twice
text:
Los Angeles Raiders vs Washington Redskins in Super Bowl XVIII .. Jim Plunkett hands off to Marcus Allen in first quarter action Marcus Allen would set rushing records for the longest touchdown run in Super Bowl history, and most yards gained in a Super Bowl game AP photo Photo ran1/23/1984, P. 45 Los Angeles Raiders vs Washington Redskins in Super Bowl XVIII
Jim Plunkett traveled a long, hard road to Super Bowl glory — and now he’s paying the price. Los Angeles Raiders vs Washington Redskins in Super Bowl XVIII .. Jim Plunkett hands off to Marcus Allen in first quarter action Marcus Allen would set rushing records for the longest touchdown run in Super Bowl history, and most yards gained in a Super Bowl game AP photo Photo ran1/23/1984, P. 45 Los Angeles Raiders vs Washington Redskins in Super Bowl XVIII
Jim Plunkett traveled a long, hard road to Super Bowl glory — and now he’s paying the price.
